overview: John Wang is the CTO and co-founder of LoanKrunch and has over 18 years in software development and various technology applications. He is primarily responsible for our entire technology platform. Most recently, he was the VP of Engineering for Sponsorhouse, Inc. John is a successful entrepreneur and co-founder of iPhenom Corporation which was successfully acquired by Kintera in 2002 (NASDAQ: BLKB). There as the Director of Architecture, he helped grow the company from 50 employees to nearly 600 in a little less than 2 years. Additionally, John has been a founding team member of Flashpoint Technology (Apple Computer spin-off) and Apple QuickTime Technology. John received a received a BS in Electrical Engineering from Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
